verbs.description: We [V: should] really stop comparing the Trump administration to Nazi Germany . It ’s a lot more like the United Federation of Planets in the evil Mirror , Mirror universe . Case in point : Stephen Miller — who does , in fact , look uncannily like Stanley ...
